title: Follow up with new member signup
description: New lead from referral. Reach out to schedule an intro tour and discuss membership options.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent welcome email with gym brochure
Left voicemail - no answer

notes.author: Michael Torres
notes.text: Lead referred by John Doe. Interested in personal training packages.

notes.author: Michael Torres
notes.text: Tried calling, went to voicemail. Will try again tomorrow.

title: Process membership renewal
description: Membership renewal is coming up. Contact member to discuss renewal options and any plan upgrades.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent renewal reminder with plan comparison
Member replied asking about Premium plan benefits
Sent detailed Premium plan info with pricing

notes.author: Sarah Mitchell
notes.text: Member's Basic plan expires March 5th. Good candidate for Premium upsell.

notes.author: Sarah Mitchell
notes.text: Emily is interested in Premium. Following up next week for decision.

title: Complete new hire orientation
description: New lead booked a tour. Prepare welcome packet and schedule onboarding walkthrough.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent appointment confirmation text
Confirmed tour date and time
Sent thank you text after tour

notes.author: Jessica Park
notes.text: Brian found us on Instagram. Very enthusiastic about group classes.

notes.author: Jessica Park
notes.text: Tour completed. Brian signed up for a trial membership!

title: Review overdue member payments
description: Lead visited on guest pass but payment for trial conversion is overdue. Follow up on payment status.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent trial offer with payment link
Reminder text about trial offer expiring
Called - said will process payment this week

notes.author: Ryan Cooper
notes.text: Carlos visited once on guest pass. Seemed interested but hasn't committed.

notes.author: Ryan Cooper
notes.text: Spoke on phone. Says he'll pay by Friday. Following up if not received.

title: Update class schedule for next month
description: Karen requested info on March class schedule. Coordinate with trainers and send her the updated options.

communicationHistory.summary: Karen asked about March Pilates schedule changes

notes.author: Alex Turner
notes.text: Karen interested in morning Pilates. Checking with Maya on March availability.

title: Staff CPR recertification follow-up
description: Nathan is a personal trainer lead interested in joining our team. Ensure CPR cert is current for onboarding.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent trainer onboarding requirements
Nathan confirmed CPR cert is up to date

notes.author: Maya Patel
notes.text: Nathan is applying as a part-time trainer. Strong background in functional fitness.

notes.author: Maya Patel
notes.text: CPR cert verified. Scheduling interview next week.

title: Follow up on cancelled membership
description: Diana was in a remarketing campaign. Reach out to understand objections and offer a win-back promotion.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent personalized win-back offer with 20% discount

notes.author: Michael Torres
notes.text: Diana clicked through remarketing email but didn't convert. Worth a personal call.

title: Send welcome email to trial members
description: Elena was a no-show for her appointment. Send a re-engagement email with a rescheduling link.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent 'We missed you' email with reschedule link
Sent follow-up text with new time options

notes.author: Sarah Mitchell
notes.text: Elena no-showed for intro session. Walked in originally so she's local.

notes.author: Sarah Mitchell
notes.text: No response to email. Trying text message approach.

title: Resolve billing dispute
description: Member reported a duplicate charge on their account. Investigate and issue credit if confirmed.

communicationHistory.summary: Member called about duplicate $49.99 charge
Sent acknowledgment email with ticket number
Confirmed duplicate charge found in system

notes.author: Jessica Park
notes.text: John Doe called about a double charge of $49.99. Checking with payment processor.

notes.author: Jessica Park
notes.text: Confirmed duplicate. Refund submitted, should process in 3-5 business days.

title: Prepare monthly attendance report
description: Luis requested his attendance records for insurance reimbursement. Compile and send January data.

communicationHistory.summary: Luis requested attendance records
Sent January attendance summary PDF

notes.author: Alex Turner
notes.text: Luis needs attendance records for his HSA reimbursement.

notes.author: Alex Turner
notes.text: Report sent. Luis visited 18 times in January.

title: Schedule personal training intro session
description: New lead from Facebook interested in group fitness. Schedule a free intro PT session to convert.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent intro text with available PT session times
Fernando replied - interested in Saturday morning

notes.author: Ryan Cooper
notes.text: Fernando found us on Facebook. Looking for group classes - PT intro could hook him.

notes.author: Ryan Cooper
notes.text: He's interested in Sat 10am slot. Need to confirm with trainer Maya.

title: Update emergency contact records
description: Member flagged outdated emergency contact info during check-in. Update records in system.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent push notification to update profile info

notes.author: Maya Patel
notes.text: Michael mentioned his emergency contact phone number changed. Sent app notification to update.

title: Quarterly safety walkthrough coordination
description: Olivia raised safety concerns during her trial visit. Schedule walkthrough and address her feedback.

communicationHistory.summary: Olivia called about safety concerns in weight room
Sent email acknowledging concerns and planned inspection

notes.author: Michael Torres
notes.text: Olivia mentioned loose equipment padding. Will inspect and address before her next visit.

title: Follow up on guest pass visit
description: Grace's guest pass expired. Follow up to gauge interest and offer a special enrollment rate.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent post-visit follow-up email
Called - interested but wants to think about it
Sent limited-time enrollment offer

notes.author: Sarah Mitchell
notes.text: Grace visited on guest pass. Enjoyed yoga class. Guest pass now expired.

notes.author: Sarah Mitchell
notes.text: She's interested but comparing with another gym. Sent our differentiators.

notes.author: Sarah Mitchell
notes.text: Sent 15% off first 3 months offer. Expires Feb 15.

title: Process refund request
description: Member requesting partial refund for classes missed due to facility closure on Jan 28.

communicationHistory.summary: Member submitted refund request via email
Acknowledged request, investigating closure dates

notes.author: Jessica Park
notes.text: David requesting refund for 2 classes missed during pipe burst closure.

notes.author: Jessica Park
notes.text: Confirmed closure was Jan 28-29. Calculating prorated credit amount.

title: Set up new member key fob access
description: New inquiry from website. Set up profile and prepare key fob for when membership is finalized.

communicationHistory.summary: Sent membership options with pricing tiers
Henry replied interested in off-peak plan

notes.author: Alex Turner
notes.text: Web inquiry - Henry wants off-peak membership. Sent pricing details.

notes.author: Alex Turner
notes.text: Henry confirmed interest. Prepping key fob #2847 for activation on signup.

title: Review and update cleaning schedule
description: Isabella mentioned cleanliness concerns during her intro class. Reviewed cleaning schedule to address.

communicationHistory.summary: Isabella submitted feedback about locker room cleanliness
Sent response detailing updated cleaning schedule

notes.author: Maya Patel
notes.text: Isabella flagged that locker rooms weren't clean during her visit. Adding extra rotation.

notes.author: Maya Patel
notes.text: Updated schedule posted. Added 7pm cleaning rotation. Notified Isabella.
